item.title: Resume
item.description: Most proud of: Built a multi-platform Python app using OOP which can be installed with pip - WallVerse Set up an Active Directory environment with fake users, groups and computers for penetration testing. SSHed to it from a Kali machine, disabled logging and Windows Defender, sniffed AD relations with SharpHound, graphed resource paths with BloodHound This site is hosted on S3, delivered with CloudFront using a custom domain name, secured with a SSL certificate from AWS Certificate Manager Education: Information Technology (Bachelor of Science) May 2019 - Dec 2023 - Grade: 3.

item.title: WallVerse
item.description: WallVerse on GitHub The idea, approach and challenges
